name: Lava Bomb
description: The fire shall incinerate everything and light up their path. Equip Lava Bomb to toss bombs and ignite flammable objects in the target area.
source: Toss a Lava Bomb at a target, dealing damage equal to {0}% of ATK and strongly launching the target. Cooldown: 45 seconds.

advancement.description: Stun targets for 2 seconds on hit, and burn them.
Increase flame damage by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Stun targets for 3 seconds on hit and tire them for 10 seconds, causing targets to lose **100** endurance after every ability use.
